allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rename GFExperience to GF experience + messaging improvements

- Rename brand from "GFExperience" to "GF experience" across all pages
- Extend conversations from 14 to 40 users with custom usernames
- Add custom messages for first 12 users
- Add bold styling for unread messages in conversation list
- Users 13-20 have creative usernames, 21-40 use generic names

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
